mapper.select: SELECT A.LOGIN_DT, CONCAT(A.LOG_CNT, '건') AS LOG_CNT FROM ( SELECT Z.LOGIN_DT, FORMAT(COUNT(*), 0) AS LOG_CNT FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.LOGIN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') LOGIN_DT FROM T_USER_LOG_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_USER_INFO B ON A.MEMBER_ID = B.USER_ID ) Z GROUP BY Z.LOGIN_DT ORDER BY Z.LOGIN_DT DESC ) A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LOGIN_DT >= #{startDate} AND A.LOGIN_DT <= #{endDate} ORDER BY A.LOGIN_DT DESC

SELECT IFNULL(Z.USER_NAME, '탈퇴한 사용자') AS MEMBER_NAME, Z.MEMBER_ID, Z.LOGIN_DATE, Z.MEMBER_LOG_CNT FROM (SELECT T.USER_NAME, T.MEMBER_ID, T.LOGIN_DATE, MAX(T.LOGIN_DT) AS LOGIN_DT , CONCAT(FORMAT(SUM(T.LOG_CNT), 0), '건') AS MEMBER_LOG_CNT , SUM(T.LOG_CNT) AS LOG_CNT FROM ( SELECT Z.USER_NAME, Z.MEMBER_ID, Z.LOGIN_DATE , Z.LOGIN_DT, COUNT(*) AS LOG_CNT FROM ( SELECT B.USER_NAME, A.MEMBER_ID, A.LOGIN_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.LOGIN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') LOGIN_DATE FROM T_USER_LOG_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_USER_INFO B ON A.MEMBER_ID = B.USER_ID ) Z GROUP BY Z.LOGIN_DATE, Z.USER_NAME, Z.MEMBER_ID, Z.LOGIN_DT ) T WHERE T.LOGIN_DATE = #{hLoginDt} GROUP BY T.USER_NAME, T.MEMBER_ID, T.LOGIN_DATE ) Z ORDER BY Z.LOG_CNT DESC, Z.LOGIN_DT DESC

SELECT A.LOGIN_DT, A.IP_ADDR, A.BROWSER_NAME FROM T_USER_LOG_INFO A INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.MEMBER_ID, A.LOGIN_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.LOGIN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DATE_LOG FROM T_USER_LOG_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_USER_INFO B ON A.MEMBER_ID = B.USER_ID ) Z ON A.MEMBER_ID = Z.MEMBER_ID AND A.LOGIN_DT = Z.LOGIN_DT WHERE Z.DATE_LOG = #{hLoginDt} AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{hMemberId} ORDER BY A.LOGIN_DT DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MLI.LOGIN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS LOG_DATE, MI.USER_NAME , MLI.LOGIN_DT, MLI.IP_ADDR, MLI.BROWSER_NAME FROM T_USER_LOG_INFO MLI INNER JOIN T_USER_INFO MI ON MLI.MEMBER_ID = MI.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND MLI.LOGIN_DT >= (STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y%m%d')) AND MLI.LOGIN_DT <= (STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y%m%d') + INTERVAL 1 DAY) ORDER BY LOG_DATE DESC, MLI.LOGIN_DT DESC
